Title: The Cheetah Girls: One World
Writer: Dan Berendsen (story by), Dan Berendsen (teleplay by), Nisha Ganatra (teleplay by), Deborah Gregory (series of books), Jen Small (teleplay by)
Actors: Adrienne Houghton, Sabrina Bryan, Kiely Williams, Roshan Seth
Plot: The girl group travel to India to star in a Bollywood movie - but end up competing for the same part.
